snippet: Roxana Baldetti, who stepped down as vice president in May, was detained Friday in connection with a customs corruption scandal that led to her resignation.
abstract: Guatemalan authorities detain former Vice Pres Roxana Baldetti in connection with customs corruption scandal that may have defrauded government of millions of dollars and led to her resignation; prosecutors say there is also evidence suggesting Pres Otto Perez Molina took part in scheme and want Molina's immunity withdrawn so they can investigate.
lead_paragraph: Roxana Baldetti, who stepped down as vice president in May, was detained Friday in connection with a customs corruption scandal that led to her resignation.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Guatemala: Former Official Is Arrested
